main event: A brilliant blue-white, round, flat object was observed for 3 1/2 minutes in Wilmington, North Carolina.
interesting points: The object had two brilliant tailpipes behind it,The observation was made visually from the ground,The object was observed at a course of 332 degrees,The sighting lasted between 10:07 and 10:10 on August 10, 1953,The conclusion of the report is that the object remains unidentified.
